full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,PADMA YANG GSANG KHROS PA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR ZAB KHYAD PAR CAN YANG ZAB PADMA DGYES PA'I 'DZUM ZHAL TZITTI'I RGYA CAN BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG YE SHES BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,CES DAG SNANG RDZUS RIS SGYU MA'I 'KHRUL 'KHOR GYIS NANG TSAN BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR YANG ZAB GDAMS PA'I RGYAL PO 'DI YANG SGRUB KHANG SPRUL SKU RIN PO CHE NAS BGRANGS PHRENG DANG, RDOR DRIL BCAS NAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR, PADMAS RJES @007B BZUNG PADMA DRAG PO STZAL LAM, MING GZHAN DGONG MCHEN PO'I LUNG GIS, ZHVA SER BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED AA CHI THU NO MON HAN DU 'BOD PA SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG RIG PA 'DZIN PA BLO BZANG YE SHES BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS KYIS BZHI SDE DGA' LDAN BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,
